if(result.match(/Just a moment/)){
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
cookie.removeCookie(source.bookSourceUrl)
var x=java.get("url").replace(java.get('key'),java.encodeURI(java.get('key'),'gbk'))

java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证")
sleep(30000)
result=java.ajax(java.get("url"))
java.log(result)
	}else{
